ygData.subject: Re: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, question ... what is fletching? does it deal with making arrows? David- Tenin - 8th lvl - Tarew Marr ... From: Aerian  To:
ygData.messageBody:
OK, question ... what is fletching? does it deal with making arrows?

David-
Tenin - 8th lvl - Tarew Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Aerian <dyne@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 12:26 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Some Questions


From: Aerian <dyne@...>

At 08:31 AM 5/10/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
>
>I would like to know a couple of things:
>
>1) Where do you get scaler molds in Freeport? I found skewer molds and
file
>molds, but no scalers??

dunno.

>2) How can a Level 7 (and also a level 10) character be selling banded
armor
>all the time (cheap too!) when the max level they can be is 40-55?? I
>thought you needed to be MUCH higher (80?) before attempting banded...

I don't beleive there is a skill cap on trade skills. I have a friend
who's level 4 and has 110 fletching, probobly the same for blacksmithing.

Aerian Spiritwind
ICQ: 1438115
